languages.text: "Отставить пререкания!" {n}Рык Иокасты остужает пыл офицеров.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, перед нами и правда лжец, хорошо кем-то обработанный. Сам он явно не сознается. Что предлагаете?"

"Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"
languages.original_text: "Отставить пререкания!" {n}Рык Иокасты остужает пыл офицеров.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, перед нами и правда лжец, хорошо кем-то обработанный. Сам он явно не сознается. Что предлагаете?"

traits.locale_text: "Cease this bickering!" {n}Jocasta's growl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

"Cease this bickering!" {n}Jocasta's growl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

"Cease this bickering!" {n}Jocasta's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

"Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

"Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

"Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

languages.text: "Hört auf zu streiten!" {n}Sauerbacks Befehl lässt die Offiziere verstummen.{/n} "Lord Captain, wir haben es hier mit einem Lügner zu tun, der bestens instruiert wurde. Er wird niemals von selbst gestehen. Was schlagt Ihr vor?"
languages.original_text: "Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf zu streiten!" {n}Sauerbacks Befehl lässt die Offiziere verstummen.{/n} "Lord Captain, wir haben es hier mit einem Lügner zu tun, der bestens instruiert wurde. Er wird niemals von selbst gestehen. Was schlagt Ihr vor?"

languages.text: « Ça suffit, vous deux ! {n}grogne Jocasta, mettant immédiatement un terme aux chamailleries des officiers.{/n} {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons ici un menteur, et un menteur bien entraîné. Il n'avouera jamais quoi que ce soit sans y être poussé. Que suggérez-vous que nous fassions ? »
languages.original_text: "Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit, vous deux ! {n}grogne Jocasta, mettant immédiatement un terme aux chamailleries des officiers.{/n} {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons ici un menteur, et un menteur bien entraîné. Il n'avouera jamais quoi que ce soit sans y être poussé. Que suggérez-vous que nous fassions ? »

languages.text: «¡Se acabó la discusión!». {n}El ladrido de Sauerback amedrenta a los oficiales, que guardan silencio.{/n} «Lord Capitán, este hombre es un mentiroso y ha memorizado bien la lección. Nunca confesará voluntariamente. ¿Qué sugiere que hagamos?».
languages.original_text: "Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Se acabó la discusión!». {n}El ladrido de Sauerback amedrenta a los oficiales, que guardan silencio.{/n} «Lord Capitán, este hombre es un mentiroso y ha memorizado bien la lección. Nunca confesará voluntariamente. ¿Qué sugiere que hagamos?».

languages.text: 「言い争いはやめろ！」{n}ザウアーバックの唸り声が士官たちを引き下がらせる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、ここにいるのは嘘つきであり、それもよく訓練された嘘つきです。奴は決して自白しないでしょう。どうすればいいと思われますか？」
languages.original_text: "Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

traits.locale_text: 「言い争いはやめろ！」{n}ザウアーバックの唸り声が士官たちを引き下がらせる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、ここにいるのは嘘つきであり、それもよく訓練された嘘つきです。奴は決して自白しないでしょう。どうすればいいと思われますか？」

languages.text: “都给我闭嘴！”{n}苏尔贝克咆哮起来，所有军官都住了口。{/n}“舰长大人，我们抓到了一个骗子，还是个训练有素的骗子。这个人根本不打算自己认罪，您觉得我们应该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: "Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"

traits.locale_text: “都给我闭嘴！”{n}苏尔贝克咆哮起来，所有军官都住了口。{/n}“舰长大人，我们抓到了一个骗子，还是个训练有素的骗子。这个人根本不打算自己认罪，您觉得我们应该怎么办？”

languages.text: "Atışmayı kesin!" {n}Sauerback'in dâhil olması, subayları susmaya zorluyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bir yalancıyla uğraşıyoruz. Hem de iyi yetişmiş bir yalancı bu. Kendi başına asla itiraf etmez. Ne yapmamızı öneriyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Cease this bickering!" {n}Sauerback's snarl forces the officers to back down.{/n} "Lord Captain, what we have here is a liar, and a well-coached one at that. He will never confess on his own. What do you suggest we do?"
